description: Enterprise techniques used by Octopus, ATT&CK software S0340 v1.0
name: Octopus (S0340)

techniques.comment: Octopus encodes C2 communications in Base64.
Octopus collects information on the Windows directory and searches for compressed RAR files on the host.
Octopus can upload and download files to and from the victim’s machine.[
Octopus can capture screenshots of the victims’ machine.
Octopus uses HTTP for C2 communications.
Octopus collects system drive information, the computer name, and the size of the disk.
Octopus collects the host IP address from the victim’s machine.
Octopus collects the username from the victim’s machine.
Octopus uses wmic.exe for local discovery information.
